biotools.summary: The MHCBN is a curated database consisting of detailed information about Major Histocompatibility Complex (MHC) Binding, Non-binding peptides and T-cell epitopes. The version 4.0 of database provides information about peptides interacting with TAP and MHC linked autoimmune diseases.
